numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Many younger people think that the world is getting better.
2. Many older people do not think that the world is getting better.
3. Indonesia has the highest number of younger people who think that the world is getting better.
4. This graph shows the perception that the world is getting better.
5. Based on this graph, there seems to be no correlation between wealth and this perception.
6. The USA is high on the graph.
7. Some poorer countries are next to the USA on the graph.
8. Some wealthier countries are higher on the graph.
9. We wonder why countries with larger populations are not on the graph.
10. We are in the same age range as the people on the graph.
11. The topic is international opinion about where the world is going.
